snippet: The European Commission said airlines that refused to participate in its carbon trading system could be banned from European airports.
abstract: European Commission says airlines that refuse to participate in its carbon trading system could be banned from European airports.
lead_paragraph: The European Commission said airlines that refused to participate in its carbon trading system could be banned from European airports.

headline.main: Europe Stands Firm on Airline Emissions, Raising Fears of a Trade Conflict
headline.print_headline: Europe Stands Firm on Airline Emissions, Raising Fears of a Trade Conflict
